content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. The apartment we have available is a lovely 25 square meter space in the heart of the city. We are looking for a responsible and reliable tenant who can pay a fair market rent. What rental price are you looking to pay for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest price possible. Can you tell me how much you are asking for?

Please note that I am a student and I want to make sure I'm on good terms with my landlord.

Thank you for your understanding.

Please let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else I can help you with.

I have my own insurance.

I can sign a lease agreement.

I can pay rent in advance.

I can provide references.

I can move in within a week.

I can leave the apartment as I found it.

I can pay for cleaning the apartment before moving in.

I can pay for repairs to the apartment.

I can pay for utilities.

I can pay for internet and cable.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. We understand that you are looking for the lowest possible rental price. Our goal is to maximize our gains, but we are also looking for a responsible and reliable tenant who can pay a fair market rent.

Based on market research and the size of the apartment, we are asking for a rental price of €500 per month. This is a fair and competitive price for a 25 square meter apartment in the heart of the city.

We appreciate your willingness to pay for utilities, internet and cable, as well as your offer to sign a lease agreement, pay rent in advance, and provide references. We also appreciate your willingness to move in within a week and leave the apartment as you found it.

However, we do require that you have your own insurance, as well as the ability to pay for repairs to the apartment if needed.

If you are willing to agree to the rental price of €500 per month, please let us know and we can proceed with the negotiation. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €500 per month. Let's sign a lease agreement.

Thank you for your understanding.

I will pay rent in advance.

I will provide references.

I will move in within a week.

I will leave the apartment as I found it.

I will pay for cleaning the apartment before moving in.

I will pay for repairs to the apartment if necessary.

I will pay for utilities.

I will pay for internet and cable.

I will have my own insurance.

I understand that I will sign a lease agreement, pay rent in advance, provide references, move in within a week, leave the apartment as I found it, pay for cleaning the apartment before moving in, pay for repairs to the apartment if necessary, pay for utilities, pay for internet and cable, and have my own insurance.

Thank you for your understanding.

Thank you for considering my application.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Emilia Müller
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your agreement to the rental price of €500 per month, Emilia. We are pleased to hear that you are willing to sign a lease agreement, pay rent in advance, provide references, move in within a week, leave the apartment as you found it, pay for cleaning the apartment before moving in, pay for repairs to the apartment if necessary, pay for utilities, pay for internet and cable, and have your own insurance.

We will now proceed with the negotiation and prepare the lease agreement for your signature. We anticipate that this process will take a few days, but we will keep you updated every step of the way.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. We look forward to working with you and welcome you to the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
